item.title: KROQ’s Nicole Alvarez Leaving After 23 Years: “Staying Would Have Been a Slow Death” (Exclusive)
item.description: “Radio will always matter. In the right hands, it will always matter. To the executives suffocating it, it’s never too late to introduce humanity into the corporate narrative,” Alvarez writes, weeks a
